original_title: The World's Smallest Woman: Meet Jyoti
overview: At 24 inches tall and a mere 12 pounds, 26-year-old Jyoti Amge is the smallest woman in the world; Jyoti is in the United States for work and to explore American culture, but also hopes to find a doctor for a serious health issue.
title: The World's Smallest Woman: Meet Jyoti
